title: Information Technology
insight: You have a strong potential in the digital world. With your interest in IT, you are well-positioned for the fast-growing tech industry in Malaysia.
advice: Focus on building a portfolio. Participate in hackathons and learn languages like Python, Java, or Dart.

title: Engineering
insight: Engineering requires strong problem-solving skills and a logical mind. Your profile suggests you are ready to tackle complex challenges.
advice: Strong grades in Math and Physics are crucial. Consider getting involved in STEM workshops or robotics clubs.

title: Business & Finance
insight: The corporate world awaits! Your interest suggests you have good leadership potential and an eye for economic trends.
advice: Develop your communication skills. Look for internships in startups or established firms to understand business operations.

title: Health & Biomedical
insight: A career in healthcare is noble and demanding. Your interest indicates a passion for science and helping others.
advice: Biology and Chemistry are your best friends. Volunteer at local clinics or hospitals to gain real-world perspective.

title: Psychology
insight: Understanding the human mind is a fascinating journey. You likely have high empathy and analytical skills.
advice: Read widely on human behavior. Strong statistics knowledge will also help in research-based psychology.

title: Health Science
insight: Allied health is a vital part of the medical ecosystem. You play a key role in patient recovery and wellbeing.
advice: Focus on practical skills and biology. Communication is key when dealing with patients' rehabilitation.
